about_the_game:
Game Overview:

Space Between is a thought-provoking walking simulator that takes you on an emotional journey through the liminal space between life and death. After a life-shattering accident, you find yourself stuck in a surreal, hostile world—one where your memories, regrets, and deepest fears come alive. Struggling with the loss of everything, you are forced to confront the person you were and the choices that brought you here.

Explore the stark landscapes of a desolate desert, fiery lava cavern, rolling hills of self-reflection, and towering mountains that represent emotional and physical barriers. But in this world of isolation and despair, there is still one thing left: a choice. Will you give up, or will you fight for a future that still holds your dreams?

With a gripping narrative and immersive environments, Space Between is a powerful experience about resilience, the search for meaning, and the ability to overcome even the darkest moments of life. It’s a reminder that, no matter how lost you feel, it’s never too late to reclaim your desire to live—and your right to chase your dreams.

Key Features:

  • An Introspective, Heartfelt Story:
    Immerse yourself in a deeply personal journey as you step into the shoes of a protagonist who has lost everything—family, friends, love—and is now trapped in an otherworldly space. Through reflective and poignant self-dialogue, confront your deepest regrets, wounds, and fears, and decide whether to let them define you or to rise above them.

  • Four Surreal Worlds to Explore:
    Venture through four uniquely haunting environments, each representing a different stage in the protagonist’s emotional journey:

    • The Lava Cavern—an inferno of panic and confusion.

    • The Desert of Regret—a barren, desolate expanse where memories of loss weigh heavily.

    • The Hills of Reflection—a place where choices are questioned and painful memories resurface.

    • The Mountains of Despair—the final emotional battleground, where the protagonist faces their ultimate decision.

  • A Powerful Self-Dialogue Experience:
    As you progress, the protagonist’s inner thoughts evolve. With each passing moment, they wrestle with feelings of guilt, loneliness, abandonment, and betrayal. Their self-dialogue invites players to reflect deeply on their own lives, encouraging growth and self-understanding as you uncover layers of their painful yet powerful journey.

  • A Choice That Defines You:
    At the culmination of your journey, you face a choice that will define your fate: surrender to despair or fight for a chance at redemption. Space Between is built around the fundamental question—can you choose to fight for the life you deserve, or will you allow the weight of your past to drag you down?

  • A Message of Hope and Resilience:
    Space Between is not just a game about despair, it’s a story about perseverance. It’s about finding the strength to keep moving forward, even when it feels impossible. At its core, the game is a reminder that it’s never too late to reclaim your dreams, that even in the darkest moments, there is always a chance to start anew. No matter what has happened to you, you still have the power to choose who you want to be.

  • Emotionally Charged Soundtrack & Immersive Visuals:
    The atmospheric soundtrack amplifies the emotional journey, shifting with the protagonist's evolving mindset. Alongside hauntingly beautiful environments, the visuals and music create an immersive experience that reflects the deep emotional stakes of the story.

Why You Should Play:

Space Between isn’t just a walking simulator—it’s an emotional experience. A game that asks you to confront your darkest moments, to reflect on the choices you've made, and to explore the deep wells of regret, anger, and despair that often define us. But, most importantly, Space Between reminds you that no matter how lost or broken you feel, you always have the power to make a choice.

In the end, Space Between is a celebration of resilience. It’s about realizing that, even in the hardest moments of life, the power to change is always within you. The past doesn’t define you, and the future isn’t set in stone. Whether you choose to fight or give in, this game offers a profound reflection on the importance of never giving up—on yourself, your dreams, or the life you still have yet to live.

Experience a game that dares to ask:

  • What happens when we hit rock bottom?

  • Can we find the strength to get back up?

  • Is it possible to reclaim our dreams, even when it seems like we’ve lost everything?

Step into the space between life and death. The last step is yours to take.
